lead_paragraph: A Navy official says a U.S. ship was forced to change course and move out of the way of Iranian fast boats while moving through the Strait of Hormuz during the weekend, in what has become a frequent occurrence there.
snippet: A Navy official says a U.S. ship was forced to change course and move out of the way of Iranian fast boats while moving through the Strait of Hormuz during the weekend, in what has become a frequent occurrence there....

headline.main: Kansas, Villanova, UCLA and Gonzaga Stay 1-4 in AP Poll
headline.print_headline: Kansas, Villanova, UCLA and Gonzaga Stay 1-4 in AP Poll
